segments.text: Excuse me , could you help me pick out a lotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got poison oak while hiking , and I need something to help me with the itching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can suggest a product called Techne that comes in a lotion or cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hikers tell me that the cream is best because it stays on longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else I can do to help with the itching ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much for all of the information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . Please feel free to ask me a question any time you need help .
segments.speaker: S2
